name: Flank & Gank
effect: If target has lower momentum than you and an ally has attacked it in this round, move 3 elements to bid of your choice.

name: Helpful Parry
effect: If enemy attacking ally and both are within reach, you can roll parry and add it to ally's defense[once per moment]

name: Furious Charge
effect: You can move without disrupting preparation for a melee attack

name: Penetrating Arrow
effect: Include second target in attack if second target is behind first in straight line

name: Take Injury
effect: Take targetâ€™s injury upon yourself (# up to your Focus)
